comments.author: Xi

comments.author: rheide
comments.content: Hm, I haven't really had much conversations with Belgian people so far. Well, except for the Belgian midget on a bicycle who worked for the cleaning service and was cleaning the park that we were sitting in. He quoted Steve Jobs on me :O

comments.author: Kamil
comments.content: Midget on a Bike...that is so typical Belgium!
